title: Real Madrid Transfer News: Yuri Berchiche, Aaron Martin Caricol, Latest Rumours

organizations.name: latest rumours real madrid transfer news

text: Real Madrid Transfer News: Yuri Berchiche, Aaron Martin Caricol, Latest Rumours DESIREE MARTIN/Getty Images Christopher Simpson Featured Columnist March 21, 2017 Real Madrid are looking for a second-choice left-back to replace Fabio Coentrao and have narrowed their search to Real Sociedad 's Yuri Berchiche and Espanyol's Aaron Martin Caricol. That's according to Marca 's Juan Ignacio Garcia-Ochoa and Marc Mayo (also reported by OKdiario), as the pair meet Real's criteria of being homegrown, likely to accept a back-up role behind Marcelo and not being overly expensive, as both have â‚¬30 million buyout clauses. Per La Liga writer Andrew Gaffney, the story made Marca 's cover: Andrew Gaffney @GaffneyVLC Real Madrid are after Yuri (former #THFC player) and Aaron Caricol, from Real Sociedad & Espanyol respectively, to replace Coentrao. #LaLiga https://t.co/P74EUNeYBp 3/21/2017, 7:43:39 AM Coentrao has made just four brief appearances this season totalling 150 minutes on the pitch because of injury, and fitness issues restricted him to just 19 outings in all competitions last year while on loan with AS Monaco. He also turned 29 earlier this month, so Los Blancos are perhaps wise to seek a replacement for him and provide Marcelo with better cover. Per Garcia-Ochoa , one target who has seemingly taken a back seat is Wolfsburg left-back Ricardo Rodriguez, who is "no longer a priority," albeit his camp is "still in contact" with the Spanish giants. Here's a look at how he's compared with Berchiche and Martin this season, per Squawka : Berchiche vs. Martin vs. Rodriguez 2016-17 League Stats Berchiche
